welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aiea, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Aiea has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by Hawaiian Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly inter-island flights for Hawaiian Airlines and other smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

airports.airport_name: Kaneohe Bay MCAS (Marion E. Carl Field) Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport is used exclusively by military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours per day.
